question: Which among the following is an example of Arbitrage?
option1: A firm of brokers purchases certain shares at BSE and sells the same number of shares at NSE to take advantage of minor difference in rates
option2: A firm of currency brokers purchases US dollars and sells the British Pounds with the same value
option3: A firm buys certain number shares of a company and sells similar number of shares of another company which is doing better in the market
option4: A firm buys certain currency today and undergoes a contract to sell the same currency after two months
answer: A firm of brokers purchases certain shares at BSE and sells the same number of shares at NSE to take advantage of minor difference in rates
